text: Maddern is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Anne Maddern (born 1955), Australian politician * Barry Maddern (1937–1994), Australian barrister and jurist * Clarence Maddern (1921–1986), American baseballer * Philippa Maddern (1952–2014), Australian historian * Rebecca Maddern (born 1977), Australian television presenter and journalist * Victor Maddern (1928–1993), English actor * Richard John Maddern-Williams, music teacher and organist ==See also== *St Maddern's Church, Madron
title: Maddern
